Description:
Detects patterns found in process executions cause by China Chopper like tiny (ASPX) webshells

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), MSTI (query)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Chopper Webshell Process Pattern
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%&ipconfig&echo%' or command like '%&quser&echo%' or command like '%&whoami&echo%' or command like '%&c:&echo%' or command like '%&cd&echo%' or command like '%&dir&echo%' or command like '%&echo [e]%' or command like '%&echo [s]%') and (process_path like '%\w3wp.exe' and parent_process_path like '%\w3wp.exe'))
